The Guardian Drake is a superior variant of the drake. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Guardian Drakes have two special attacks. They share the same special attack as regular drakes, launching volcanic breath at the player that hits four times in quick succession for up to 8 damage each. Players can dodge this attack by moving one tile away before the volcanic breath lands.

Guardian Drakes may also attack with a special melee attack which stuns the player and is capable of hitting over 30 damage. This attack hits through prayer but can be avoided if the player steps out of melee range quickly enough. This special attack is only used when the player is in melee distance. Unlike regular drakes, the volcanic breath special is only used when the player is not in melee distance.

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 212,000 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Guardian Drake kill is worth 141,583.77.

The average Guardian Drake kill while on a Konar task is worth 144,466.47.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Guardian Drake has the highest combat level of all superior slayer monsters.
